title: Wanted: Lower-resolution, smaller-file-size photos
content:
Google's camera app offers only two options for photo size: medium (which is >1 MB) and full-size (which is even larger).  Most of the pictures I take are going to be inserted into emails, and a high-res. photo of 1 MB, or even a quarter of that size, is far too large.  (Only a tiny bit of the ginormous photo is viewable at one time, forcing the recipient to zoom way out so that the email's text then becomes unreadable.)

I find myself having to upload every photo I take to a website that shrinks the file size drastically, then download the smaller version back to my computer.  Surely there's a better way using either the camera app or the photo app that I just haven't found yet....right?
